radiographic_examinations.findings: Symmetrically enlarged pituitary gland without evidence of an adenoma.
No evidence of tumor; serum GH and PRL were 1.3 and 24 ng/ml, respectively.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: GH and PRL suppressed upon oral glucose load.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Symmetrical and slightly enlarged pituitary gland without evidence of an adenoma.
